intent_analysis:
Intent: The user expects the dining room light to be turned on automatically when the refrigerator door is opened.  
Constraints & cues: The command is triggered by the refrigerator's contact sensor detecting the door opening, and the action involves controlling one of the available meross Light Strips in the dining room.  
Risk assessment: There is ambiguity regarding which specific meross Light Strip in the dining room should be controlled, as multiple devices are available. Further clarification is needed to avoid potential miscommunication.
